column3: Blade <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>, it is an honor. Would that my brothers- and sisters-in-arms had survived to see Bozja free of the IVth Legion.
Ah, my apologies─we have not been formally introduced. I am Meryall, the...the last of Gunnhildr's Blades.
And so long as I live, I swear on my honor as a Blade of the queen, history will not forget the sacrifices made to grant Bozja her freedom. The names of my fallen comrades will live on!
That the imperials would dare sully their honor by turning them against us, turning them into monsters... It is more than my heart can bear.
For a blessing, one of my fellow Blades yet remained whole of body and we were able to take him into custody.
If I understand currently, a cure for tempering has been discovered, yes? Then it is only a matter of time before his mind is restored.
Then we can begin to rebuild Gunnhildr's Blades in earnest. It is the least we can do to honor our fallen.
If not for you, I very much doubt I would even be here to carry on the traditions of Gunnhildr's Blades. On behalf of the Blades who came before, and those who will come after, I thank you.
